roleset.name: exchange
roleset.note: TRADE-V NOTES: VerbNet class exchange-13.6-1. (from trade.01-v)
TRADE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry trade.01; OntoNotes sense grouings trade.01, trade.02; maps to VN class exchange-13.6-1. Framed by Claire (from trade.01-n)
TRADING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, trade-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls exchange-13.6-1. (from trading.01-n)

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium, traded for or at

example.name: all args
example.text: John traded his eternal soul to the devil for one good night's sleep.

example.name: ergative
example.text: [Bank of New England's shares]-1 are traded *trace*-1 on the New York Stock Exchange.
example.arg: on the New York Stock Exchange

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Dealers traded actively on Wednesday for their own accounts

example.name: with price
example.text: The issue trades at a premium to its face amount.
example.arg: at a premium to its face amount

example.name: Traders only
example.text: Great efforts have been made to improve our foreign trade.

example.name: Light Verb with items exchanged
example.text: I'll make you a trade of my ham sandwich for your candy bar.

example.name: Traded away only
example.text: The couple stayed in a Paris apartment for two weeks as a trade for their summer home in Maine during that time.
example.arg: for their summer home in Maine

example.name: arg0
example.text: But , most of those thought it was probably insider trading .

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Yes his trading a fourth-round pick for Ty Detmer was a doozy,

roleset.name: to surpass another in trading
roleset.note: OUT_TRADE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in ontonnotes-miss. Framed by Claire. (from trade.02-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: `` It 's very tough for most individuals to out - trade the mutual funds or the market , '' says Mr. Lipper
example.arg: the mutual funds or the market

roleset.name: trade off, exchange
roleset.note: TRADEOFF-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry trade.01; maps to VN class exchange-13.6-1. Framed by Claire. (from tradeoff.01-n)

roles.note: No examples of args 2 or 4 found with this noun. See other trade entries for examples. (from tradeoff.01-n)

example.name: Within LVC, args 0 & 1
example.text: Marketers believe most Americans won't make the convenience trade-off ... .

example.name: With Arg3
example.text: This didn't give Americans much confidence that their trade-off of Fourth Amendment freedoms for a little extra safety is a good deal.

example.name: Arg 3 only
example.text: The trade-off with bonds then is more security for less return on your investment.
